CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(Qualified_Date__c), 1, "Jan" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 2, "Feb" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 3, "Mar" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 4, "Apr" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 5, "May" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 6, "Jun" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 7, "Jul" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 8, "Aug" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 9, "Sep" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 10,"Oct" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 11,"Nov" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), 12,"Dec" & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Qualified_Date__c)), " " )
CustomField.label: Qualified Month
